panels.title: 看板情緒分數 (Sentiment Score)
panels.description: PTT 股板整體情緒分數趨勢。> 0 偏多，< 0 偏空。

targets.query:
from(bucket: "ptt_sentiment")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "board_sentiment")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avg_score")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: 恐慌 / 貪婪指數 (Fear & Greed)
panels.description: 畢業文比例 vs. 歐印文比例。畢業文飆高 = 潛在做多，歐印文飆高 = 潛在過熱。

targets.query:
from(bucket: "ptt_sentiment")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "contrarian_index")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "euphoria_ratio" or r._field == "capitulation_ratio")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r.euphoria_ratio - r.capitulation_ratio}))

panels.title: 反指標趨勢 (Contrarian Trend)
panels.description: 畢業文 / 歐印文比例隨時間變化。

targets.query:
from(bucket: "ptt_sentiment")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "contrarian_index")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "capitulation_ratio" or r._field == "euphoria_ratio")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: 個股討論熱度 Top 10 (Ticker Buzz)
panels.description: 討論量最高的前 10 支股票。紅色 = 異常飆升。

targets.query:
from(bucket: "ptt_sentiment")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ticker_buzz")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "mentions")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 10)

panels.title: Buzz 異常標的 (Anomaly Alert)
panels.description: Buzz score >= 2.0 的異常標的。Z-score 越高越可疑。

targets.query:
from(bucket: "ptt_sentiment")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ticker_buzz")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.anomaly == "true")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "buzz_score" or r._field == "mentions" or r._field == "name")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time", "ticker"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["buzz_score"], desc: true)

panels.title: 板塊輪動 (Sector Rotation)
panels.description: 各投資主題的討論熱度排行。追蹤散戶資金關注方向。

targets.query:
from(bucket: "ptt_sentiment")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sector_heat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "mentions")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"], desc: true)

panels.title: 看多 / 看空文章數 (Bull vs. Bear)
panels.description: 每輪爬取的看多/看空/中性文章數量。

targets.query:
from(bucket: "ptt_sentiment")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "board_sentiment")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "bullish" or r._field == "bearish" or r._field == "neutral")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: 板塊熱度趨勢 (Sector Heat Over Time)
panels.description: 各板塊討論量的時間變化。觀察關鍵字從某主題轉向另一主題的轉折點。

targets.query:
from(bucket: "ptt_sentiment")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sector_heat")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "mentions")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
